channel.title: What‚Äôs your favourite song / band / genre right now?
channel.description:
I wanna know your favorite songs, no limits on genre or style, just surprise me with good music. Right now I really like this song: https://open.spotify.com/track/3sTN90bIP2cJ1783ctHykO?si=LgUhKelk
Btw that‚Äôs Lovesick by Mura Masa and A$AP Rocky if y‚Äôall don‚Äôt have Spotify

item.title: What‚Äôs your favourite song / band / genre right now?
item.dc:creator: Graye
item.description:
I listen to mostly future bass, melodic dubstep, and future bounce and house.

Literally the coolest drop ever made:
https://soundcloud.com/defsharp/guardian

Crazy crazy melodic dubstep that becomes full dubstep song:
https://soundcloud.com/officialpandaeyes/panda-eyes-radiate-1

Awesome remix of don‚Äôt let me down:
(you‚Äôve probably heard the remix before)
https://soundcloud.com/illeniumofficial/the-chainsmokers-dont-let-me-down-illenium-remix

Just listen to the 808 during the drop:
https://soundcloud.com/dropkingdom/martin-garrix-now-that-ive-found-you-dropwizz-x-savagez-trap-remix

This song is perfect, and the drop is so experimental and catchy:
https://soundcloud.com/kidcometmusic/imagine-dragons-believer-kid-comet-nebula-remix

You will bob your head:
https://soundcloud.com/martingarrix/byte

Just an all around awesome song, it‚Äôs gonna get stuck in your head I guarantee:
https://soundcloud.com/ark-hors/mesto-tokyo

I know this is a lot.
but you should check at least one of them out because they are really good songs!

Read full topic

item.description:
Really hard for me to pick favorites especially since I like to listen to pretty much all genres (except countryüòù) but if I had to pick some favoites I guess they‚Äôd be‚Ä¶
Songs:
Mesto- Chances
Florian Picasso- Final Call(Mesto & Justin Mylo Remix)

Green Day- Jesus of Suburbia
Martin Garrix- Forbidden Voices

Artists:
Martin Garrix (all time favüòÑ)
Mike Williams
Green Day
Linkin Park
YOUNG NUT
Eminem

Genres:
All of Dance (mostly house)
Alternative
Rap

I just like to listen to a lot of music‚Ä¶
Sorry about the long reply lol

item.dc:creator: anon10595533
item.description:
Favorite song(s):

  • @anechoik - fluid
  • Tom Berx - Vivet
  • Jelle Slump - Dreams
  • San Holo - I Still See Your Face (Ellis Remix)
  • JAKE - Need To Know
  • Ellis x Miss Mary - In The Wild
  • k?d - Glitch Boy
  • Madeon & Porter Robinson - Shelter

Favorite genre(s):

  • Future House (Ellis & Jelle Slump style)
  • Future Bass (k?d, Porter Robinson & Madeon style)
  • Progressive House (Martin Garrix style)
  • Future Bounce (Tom Berx style)
  • Meme Songs (the interwebz style)

Favorite artist(s):

Tom Berx
San Holo
Ellis
Martin Garrix
k?d
Madeon
Porter Robinson
me
